content: I just filed Add an option to make a stream default for new users in stream creation and editing UIs #24048. Happy to edit the issue description if folks have suggestions; it just seemed easiest to write up as an issue first and then kick off a discussion here.

That description looks good. It's something we've always imagined doing, though I've been kinda holding off on thinking about because we probably want to replace "default streams" with some sort of more flexible "stream groups" feature.
